channel.title: P3 Podcast Network
channel.description: All shows from the P3 Podcast Network.
channel.itunes:author: P3 Podcast Network

item.title: [Crit Happens!] Nat 20 & Unwind: The Unwritten Favor Part 2
item.description:
This Nat 20 & Unwind sits in the aftermath of a heavy chapter. We slow the pace, talk through the choices that mattered, and unpack what it feels like to say goodbye when the dice are not the ones deciding. The table reflects on character growth, quiet consequences, and the emotional weight carried forward into what comes next. Laughter breaks the tension, honesty fills the gaps, and the group takes a needed breath before stepping back into the fire.

Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/crit-happens--6718900/support.

Syndicate Disclaimer:

By scale and by secret, we endure. The tales within this episode draw upon the great game of Dungeons & Dragons, used here under fair use for storytelling and camaraderie. The Scalebound Syndicate makes no claim to the trademarks of Wizards of the Coast, only to the memories forged at our table.

-Scalebound Syndicate High Command

item.title: [Crit Happens!] The Unwritten Favor Part 2: The Goodbye
item.description:
In this episode, the party faces a quiet moment that carries more weight than any battle. After everything endured, they are forced to stop, breathe, and let go. Choices are made with intention rather than steel, and the cost of the road behind them finally comes due. As plans shift and resolve hardens, the world does not pause to mourn. It watches. The path forward remains open, but something vital is left behind, not in failure, but in honor.

Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/crit-happens--6718900/support.

item.title: [Crit Happens!] Nat 20 & Unwind: The Unwritten Favor
item.description:
In this episode of Nat 20 & Unwind, we decompress after The Unwritten Favor.We talk through Nyros, the reveal of The Unwritten, and why this session hit harder than a normal combat night. We unpack the moral pressure, the Syndicate reactions, and how forcing truth without giving guidance changes the table dynamic.We also discuss player reactions, hard choices, and what it means when a campaign stops asking what is right and starts asking what you are willing to carry.And Zebulon may or not lose money for his tavern, The Whisperfang...

Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/crit-happens--6718900/support.

Syndicate Disclaimer:

By scale and by secret, we endure. The tales within this episode draw upon the great game of Dungeons & Dragons, used here under fair use for storytelling and camaraderie. The Scalebound Syndicate makes no claim to the trademarks of Wizards of the Coast, only to the memories forged at our table.

item.title: [Crit Happens!] The Unwritten Favor
item.description:
In The Unwritten Favor, the party enters the Frostline Watchtower and comes face to face with Nyros.A new faction is revealed, and they believe memory should never be owned, erased, or hoarded. Truth must be spoken. Once faced, it should be allowed to rest.Nyros offers a bargain tied to truth and consequence. The party must decide how far they are willing to go once a confession is complete and silence is no longer an option.This episode focuses on tension, authority, and responsibility. No clear villains. No clean victories. Only choices that leave marks.What happens after the truth is spoken matters more than the truth itself.


Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/crit-happens--6718900/support.

item.title: [Crit Happens!] Nat 20 & Unwind: The Break
item.description:
After a tense return to the table, Nat 20 and Unwind breaks down everything that went wrong at Pyreheart and everything that followed. The cast talks through Kasdeya‚Äôs departure, the weight of Nyros‚Äôs betrayal, and what it means to face an enemy who is always one step ahead. Expect behind-the-scenes discussion, player reactions, and a chance to breathe after a heavy session before the story moves into its next dangerous phase.


Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/crit-happens--6718900/support.

item.title: [Crit Happens!] The Break
item.description:
The fallout of Pyreheart follows the Agents into the mountains. With Kasdeya gone and the Syndicate silent, the team chooses its first move in a fractured world. Their path leads them deep into the Shatterpeaks, where an abandoned watchtower bleeds heat it was never meant to hold. As old wards fail and the land itself pushes back, the Agents realize they are not the first to arrive. The truth waiting inside Frostline Watchtower is deliberate, controlled, and far closer than expected.


Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/crit-happens--6718900/support.

item.title: [Crit Happens!] Nat 20 and Unwind: "The Pyreheart Accord Fallout"
item.description:
After the Pyreheart Accord arc ends, Nat 20 shifts into a lighter breakdown of the chaos that unfolded. The cast steps back from the tension to talk through the decisions, the betrayal, and the fallout in a casual format. They share highlights, favorite moments, and the choices that shaped the story. This episode gives space to breathe after a heavy arc and helps the audience understand where the team stands before the next chapter begins.

Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/crit-happens--6718900/support.

item.title: [Crit Happens!] The Pyreheart Accord Part IV: "Fractured Ranks"
item.description:
In this final episode of "The Pyreheart Accord" arc, the fallout from Nyros turning on the party reaches every corner of the Syndicate. The Dominion and the Hollow Host now stand united under the signed Accord, and the Agents are forced to confront where their loyalties stand after their narrow escape. The Syndicate gathers its leaders, questions the team, and issues a new directive as fractures spread across the land. Old ruins begin to stir. Strange signals rise from the mountains. The Agents face fear, doubt, and the first hints of something far older waking in the dark. The road ahead is uncertain, but one truth is clear. The world has changed, and the next mission will decide who survives what comes next.


Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/crit-happens--6718900/support.

item.title: [Crit Happens!] Nat 20 & Unwind: U.N.I.T. Debrief
item.description:
The Crit Happens crew sits down to unpack the U.N.I.T. arc, where everyone played a Wild Magic Sorcerer and tried to hold the world together with unstable spells. You hear how the Universal Neomagic Isolation Team came to life, why surge-on-every-cast felt wild at the table, and what it was like to fight a Breach Core that fed on their chaos.The players walk through their favorite surges, close calls, and the moment the rift pulled them in mid mission. You get DM perspective on planning controlled chaos, running Instability as a hidden clock, and keeping the story tense without shutting down the fun. The crew talks about what they would change next time, what surprised them most, and whether U.N.I.T. should return when the next anomaly hits Virelios.

Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/crit-happens--6718900/support.

item.title: [Crit Happens!] Crit Happens Presents: U.N.I.T. "Surge Point"
item.description:
The third and final U.N.I.T. arc episode begins at the center of the Spiral Chamber as the source of the neomagic instability reveals itself. The chamber reacts in full force, shifting light, twisting shadows, and amplifying every surge the operatives create. The fractured relic at the core awakens, feeding on wild magic and lashing out in unstable arcs.The episode focuses on a sustained battle inside a hostile environment that changes with each action the team takes. Surges shift the terrain. Spikes of arcane pressure interrupt movement. The chamber tests their coordination and control as much as their strength. By the end, the team faces the full power of the instability and must contain or neutralize it before the zone collapses around them, setting the tone for the mission that follows.

Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/crit-happens--6718900/support.

item.title: [Crit Happens!] Nat 20 & Unwind: The Toymaker's Regret
item.description:
On this episode of Nat 20 & Unwind, the cast takes a breath after an emotionally heavy holiday session of Crit Happens. We talk through the big roleplay moments, the tough choices that didn‚Äôt come down to dice, and how it felt to navigate a story where listening mattered just as much as action. From character reactions to behind the scenes table dynamics, this conversation reflects on what happens when a game slows down and lets the story breathe.

Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/crit-happens--6718900/support.

Syndicate Disclaimer:

-Scalebound Syndicate High Command

item.title: [Crit Happens!] The Toymaker's Regret Part II
item.description:
In Part II of the holiday episode of Crit Happens, the party ventures deeper into a place that offers warmth without obligation and answers without certainty. As conversations replace combat and quiet choices carry real weight, the adventurers must confront what it truly means to help someone who may not want to be saved. With tension building beneath the surface, this roleplay heavy chapter explores purpose, rest, and the consequences of deciding when to stay and when to walk away.

Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/crit-happens--6718900/support.

Syndicate Disclaimer:

By scale and by secret, we endure. The tales within this episode draw upon the great game of Dungeons & Dragons, used here under fair use for storytelling and camaraderie. The Scalebound Syndicate makes no claim to the trademarks of Wizards of the Coast, only to the memories forged at our table.

-Scalebound Syndicate High Command

item.title: [Crit Happens!] The Toymaker's Regret: Part I
item.description:
Snow falls softly on a town dressed for the holidays, where lanternlight glows warm, hearths stay lit, and peace feels almost too easy to find.When people begin to quietly disappear‚Äîwithout fear, without struggle, without alarm. The party is drawn into a mystery that refuses to call itself one. Homes remain warm. Bread stays in the oven. Chairs sit empty, waiting for someone who may never return.As comforting traditions give way to subtle wrongness, the party follows whispers, rumors, and unfinished routines toward something the town insists is kind‚Ä¶ even as it feels increasingly impossible.Part I ends at the threshold of a place that shouldn‚Äôt exist. Where warmth lingers, music waits, and every visitor is promised one simple truth:Everyone has a purpose.Part II continues next week.

Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/crit-happens--6718900/support.

item.title: [Crit Happens!] Crit Happens Presents: U.N.I.T. "The Search for the Source"
item.description:
Follow the team after their fall through the red rift into an unfamiliar zone of cracked black stone and pulsing light. Their Codices activate on their own, warning of unstable readings and a nearby breach source. The squad follows a narrow path toward a circular chamber where the air is silent, the ground vibrates, and the zone begins to react to their presence.As they descend into the Spiral Chamber, the stone echoes, the light shifts, and the environment responds to every movement. Lines of purple energy guide them inward while the pressure of the zone grows with each step. At the center, something waits. The episode builds tension through travel, observation, and rising instability, ending as the team reaches the heart of the chamber and prepares for whatever comes next.

Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/crit-happens--6718900/support.

Syndicate Disclaimer:

item.title: [Crit Happens!] Crit Happens: U.N.I.T. Deployed
item.description:
The Universal Neomagic Isolation Team, U.N.I.T., deploys into the Echofields after violent wild magic spikes wipe out a full Syndicate scout crew. The landscape loops. Memories slip. Spellcasting fractures into unstable variants. U.N.I.T. navigates the shifting ground while hostile spell-spawned entities stalk the wastes. Every surge grows stronger, and every reading points to something building beneath the surface.As the squad pushes deeper, their stabilizers struggle to hold. Temporal echoes overlap. Identities blur at the edges. The mission shifts from reconnaissance to containment as the team realizes the surges are converging on a single unseen source. The episode ends on a rising harmonic pulse that sweeps across the wastes, drowning out comms and shaking the entire region, leaving U.N.I.T. bracing for whatever comes next.
Follow our socials! https://linktr.ee/CritHappensPodcast Thanks to our Sponsors!

item.title: [Crit Happens!] Crit Happens: The Lost Mission (Fear the Dark)
item.description:
Crit Happens: The Lost Missions ‚Äî Episode 2: Fear the DarkThe second simulation pushes deeper into the Syndicate‚Äôs forbidden archives. Labeled Operation: Fear the Dark, this test scenario was pulled from an incomplete mission file‚Äîno author, no coordinates, no memory tags. The Overseers want to know why.Agents awaken in total darkness, surrounded by sound that moves like a living thing. Their task: reestablish a forgotten Syndicate outpost buried beneath the Ashen Belt, where the torches never stay lit and the walls breathe like lungs. Something old still hunts down here, something that remembers light‚Äîand hates it.As the simulation unravels, the agents begin to question whether this is a test‚Ä¶ or an echo of an operation that actually happened.Every shadow moves. Every whisper knows your name.
Welcome back to The Lost Missions.

item.title: [Crit Happens!] Nat 20 & Unwind: Signatories
item.description:
The group sits down after the Pyreheart summit to breathe. They talk through the tension in the hall. They walk back through the key choices that shaped the Accord. Each player breaks down their own moments. They unpack the fallout and where the story heads next. The table cools off, laughs a little, and resets after a heavy session.

item.title: [Crit Happens!] The Pyreheart Accord Part III: Signatories
item.description:
The party reaches Pyreheart Stronghold for the long-awaited Accord. Dominion leaders and the Hollow Host gather under tense silence. Old grudges surface. Strange omens stir beneath the mountain. The ceremony begins, but nothing in Pyreheart stays peaceful for long. Choices are made in fire and ash. The fate of the Accord takes a sharp turn, and the summit ends with consequences that echo far beyond the hall.

Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/crit-happens--6718900/support.

item.title: [Crit Happens!] Nat 20 & Unwind: Vault of the Black Star
item.description:
Nat 20 & Unwind ‚Äî Vault of the Black Star (The Lost Missions Debrief)The first simulation is complete. The team emerges from the Vault of the Black Star ‚Äî shaken, half-intact, and missing more than a few memories. In this debrief, the cast steps out of the Syndicate‚Äôs simulation to unpack what just happened.We break down how the mission played out, what went wrong in the Still Cold, and which mechanics tested the limits of sanity. From corrupted memory checks to zero-gravity combat, this Unwind episode explores how Vault of the Black Star blurred the line between player and experiment.Expect laughter, theorycrafting, and post-mission confessions as the crew compares notes on The Archivist Below and what the simulation might be trying to teach them.
SponsorsDungeon Trader ‚Äì dungeontrader.appKobold Press ‚Äì koboldpress.comNomono ‚Äì nomono.co

item.title: [Crit Happens!] Crit Happens: The Lost Missions (Vault of the Black Star)
item.description:
Crit Happens: The Lost Missions ‚Äî Episode 1: Vault of the Black StarWelcome to The Lost Missions ‚Äî a classified simulation within the Syndicate archives. Agents volunteer for these experimental reruns, testing old contracts and discarded session blueprints buried deep in the Oathbinder‚Äôs Ledger.The first reconstruction, Vault of the Black Star, drops the team into the frozen abyss of the Still Cold. Their mission: recover a crystalline key fragment from a long-sealed prison once used to contain The Archivist Below, an entity that devours memory and identity.But this isn‚Äôt a real deployment ‚Äî or so the Overseers claim. Each simulation rewinds fragments of past missions to test new tactics, altered outcomes, and impossible odds. Every variable is recorded. Every death analyzed. Every success erased.The question is no longer if they survive, but what the simulation remembers when it‚Äôs over.
Sponsors:Dungeon Trader ‚Äì dungeontrader.appKobold Press ‚Äì koboldpress.comNomono ‚Äì nomono.co

item.title: [Crit Happens!] The Pyreheart Accord: Part 2 - The Arrival
item.description:
The Syndicate agents press onward through the choking heat of the Ashen Belt, their mission heavy on every step. After days of travel through ash-choked passes and rivers of molten glass, the silhouette of Pyreheart Stronghold looms ‚Äî a fortress carved into living magma, where banners of the Dominion flutter beside the silent sigils of the Hollow Host.The party‚Äôs approach is anything but simple. Scaling the fortress‚Äôs jagged exterior, they brave volcanic gusts, cascading embers, and the echoing hymns of unseen sentinels. Beneath them, the molten caldera hums like a heartbeat ‚Äî the Accord waits above, its signatories sharpening both quills and knives.Yet as they breach the outer wall, smoke is not the only thing that clouds their path. The agents face choices that cut deeper than steel: mercy or mission, truth or loyalty. In the halls of Pyreheart, even the righteous burn.Creative Use Disclaimer: This podcast is a transformative work based on Dungeons & Dragons (5th Edition) under the Open Game License. All characters, settings, and story elements are original creations set within the homebrew world of Virelios.


Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/crit-happens--6718900/support.

item.title: [Crit Happens!] Nat 20 & Unwind ‚Äì The Pyreheart Accord, Part I: Reflections Before the Fir
item.description:
The dice have cooled, the ash has settled, and the Syndicate‚Äôs agents finally exhale.
In this companion after-show, the cast of Crit Happens! gathers around the table to unpack the first steps of The Pyreheart Accord arc‚Äîsharing their favorite market moments, character choices, and theories about what truly awaits inside Mount Varron.From wild shopping antics in Cindermarch to the creeping tension of a world on the edge of treaty and betrayal, the crew breaks down how these seemingly quiet beginnings set the tone for a volcanic descent into chaos. Expect laughter, speculation, and a few heartfelt confessions about what it means to play heroes in a world built on memory and fire.Pull up a chair, pour a drink, and roll high on relaxation‚Äîit‚Äôs time to unwind.Legal Disclaimer:
Nat 20 & Unwind is an independent after-show companion to Crit Happens!, a Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition actual-play podcast set in the original world of Virelios. This production operates under the Open Game License (OGL 1.0a). All characters, storylines, and settings‚Äîincluding the Scalebound Syndicate and The Pyreheart Accord‚Äîare original creative works and are not affiliated with, endorsed, or sponsored by Wizards of the Coast, Hasbro, or any official D&D property. item.title: [Crit Happens!] The Pyreheart Accord, Part I: Embers of Preparation
item.description:
With the weight of a world on the brink of war, the Scalebound agents take one last breath before the firestorm.
Episode One follows the team through the markets of Cindermarch, where ash-forged merchants and relic-peddlers whisper of the coming summit between the Dominion of Fahlreach and the Hollow Host. Between bartering for enchanted steel, memory-ink, and phoenix-proof cloaks, each agent arms themselves for what lies ahead‚Äîpolitics wrapped in prophecy and treachery bound in gold.As the sun bleeds across the horizon, their caravan sets out toward Mount Varron, the volcanic citadel known as Pyreheart Stronghold. The roads twist through glassed ravines and smoking vents where the land itself still remembers the Oracle‚Äôs fire. Strange travelers shadow their path, and distant tremors warn that the mountain is waking.It‚Äôs the quiet before the eruption‚Äîthe moment where steel is tested, faith is questioned, and the first sparks of the Accord begin to catch.Legal Disclaimer:
Crit Happens! is an independent production set within the original world of Virelios. This show uses mechanics from Dungeons & Dragons (5th Edition) under the Open Game License (OGL 1.0a). All storylines, settings, and characters‚Äî including the Scalebound Syndicate, Virelios, and The Pyreheart Accord‚Äîare original creative works and are not affiliated with, endorsed, or sponsored by Wizards of the Coast, Hasbro, or any other official D&D property. Dungeons & Dragons and all associated trademarks are the property of Wizards of the Coast, LLC.

item.title: [Crit Happens!] Nat 20 and Unwind: After The Curtain Falls
item.description:
The stage lights have dimmed, the applause has faded, and the laughter still echoes a little too long. The crew gathers around the table‚Äînot for battle, but for breath.Join the cast of Crit Happens! as they unwind after the House of Fun arc: talking through the traps that tested their nerves, the confessions that cost blood, and the lessons hidden behind the jokes. From near-death theatrics to Nyros‚Äô rebirth and Zebulon‚Äôs vow of water-only discipline, the players pull back the curtain on what it felt like inside Virelios‚Äô most dangerous carnival.Expect laughter, reflection, and maybe a little chaos as the party decompresses, debates their best (and worst) rolls, and shares what they learned about their characters‚Äîand themselves‚Äîinside the House that wanted to understand them.‚ÄúYou can‚Äôt spell ‚Äòfun‚Äô without ‚Äòuhhh.‚Äô‚ÄùüéôÔ∏è A special roundtable episode where the players of Crit Happens! step out of character, pour a drink (or just water), and unpack the madness behind the magic.‚öñÔ∏è Legal Disclaimer:
Crit Happens! and Nat 20 & Unwind are independent, fan-produced podcasts operating under Creative Use and Fair Play provisions. All game systems, mechanics, and terminology are used pursuant to the Open Game License (OGL 1.0a) and in accordance with Wizards of the Coast‚Äôs Fan Content Policy.These shows are not affiliated with, endorsed, or sponsored by Wizards of the Coast, Hasbro, or any other rights-holding entities. All original storylines, characters, settings, and audio materials ‚Äî including Virelios, The Scalebound Syndicate, and Crit Happens! branding ‚Äî are ¬© 2025 Spencer Hart & P3 Podcast Network.This podcast exists to celebrate storytelling, friendship, and the unforgettable chaos of rolling dice together.

item.title: [Crit Happens!] The House of Fun, Part II: Teeth Beneath the Smile
item.description:
The laughter fades, but the House isn‚Äôt done playing.After surviving the stage and the Goblin‚Äôs performance, our Syndicate agents press deeper into the House of Fun, where patience becomes a weapon and the walls breathe in time with the ticking of unseen gears. Traps whisper lessons about virtue, and every choice weighs heavier than the last.Acid swamps, half-spoken vows, and the haunting promise of a final curtain call‚Äîthis ‚Äúday off‚Äù turns into a descent into spectacle and self. The party will learn what it costs to be clever‚Ä¶ and what it means when the applause finally stops.‚ÄúGlory is cheap. Meaning is expensive.‚ÄùüïØÔ∏è Part II of the House of Fun arc ‚Äî where the laughter cracks, the truth bleeds through, and every virtue is tested beneath the stage lights.
‚öñÔ∏è Legal Disclaimer:

item.title: [Crit Happens!] The House of Fun, Part I: Laugh Track
item.description:
The Syndicate promised a week of rest and amusement‚Ä¶ but when our agents step through the lacquered doors of the House of Fun, they find laughter has a sharper edge.
Bright lights, false smiles, and a stage that demands performance‚Äîthe kind that draws blood when you miss your cue.Svara, Zebulon, Nyros, Ogaman, Kasdeya, and Osysa test their teamwork in a theater of tricks, uncovering that every joke hides a threat and every spotlight hides something watching. The first half of their ‚Äúday off‚Äù crescendos in the Goblin Puzzle, a performance that‚Äôs less riddle and more ritual.The applause comes a heartbeat too late.‚ÄúWelcome to the show, darlings‚Äîremember, the House always gets its laugh.‚ÄùüïØÔ∏è Part I of the House of Fun arc ‚Äî a deadly day off full of spectacle, paranoia, and puzzles that remember who you are.

item.title: [Crit Happens!] Nat 20 and Unwind (Echoes of the Forgotten Self)
item.description:
Join us as we step back from the chaos of the Echofields and into Nat 20 & Unwind, our post-session lounge where the dice stop rolling and the reflections sink in. We recap the Syndicate‚Äôs harrowing journey through the Vault of Forgotten Names, share thoughts on the memories lost and truths uncovered, and reflect on how the mission scarred and strengthened our agents. High Command delivers rewards, pay, and a new Syndicate relic to mark their survival ‚Äî but as always, the Wastes never let anyone walk away unchanged.

item.title: [Crit Happens!] Echoes of the Forgotten
item.description:
The agents of the Scalebound Syndicate descend into the Echofields & Memory Wastes, where memories twist and names are devoured. Inside the Vault of Forgotten Names, truth and lies carry as much weight as steel. Can Mimi, Svara, and Zebulon feed the Vault enough to escape alive‚Äîor will the Wastes claim the memory of them forever?

item.title: [Crit Happens!] At The Burning Gate
item.description:
The Syndicate‚Äôs agents descend into the volcanic depths of the Ashen Belt, where fire and memory burn brighter than truth. What begins as an investigation into missing scouts soon erupts into a desperate struggle against cultists, corrupted guardians, and the fury of the Burning Gate itself.Will the party seal the flames‚Äîor be consumed by them?Catch the chaos, the clashes, and the choices in Episode 3 of Crit Happens!

item.title: [Crit Happens!] Return The Favour
item.description:
üì° VEBS // SYNDICATE TRANSMISSION
Status: Cleared for Operative ReviewThe tides conceal debts unspoken. Along the reefs of the Isle of Thros, the Syndicate has marked a thread worth following. Agents are dispatched to wade the currents of secrecy, where silence holds as much weight as steel.
This mission is no simple strike‚Äîeach choice carries weight, and every current tests loyalty. Remember: in the eyes of the Syndicate, favors are never forgotten‚Ä¶ only repaid.
Oathbinder‚Äôs Note: Episode cleared for public broadcast. Proceed with discretion.
By Scale, By Secret, We Endure.

item.title: [Crit Happens!] Return The Favour
item.description:
üéô Episode 2 ‚Äì Return the Favour

The sea is never without its secrets, and on the rocky shores of the Isle of Thros, debts are not so easily washed away. When the Syndicate calls, the party must descend into a world of shifting tides, silent sentinels, and peril hidden beneath the waves. Honor, survival, and trust are tested as they navigate a mission where every current pulls in a different direction.

item.title: [Crit Happens!] Melody of the Grave
item.description:
üìú Syndicate Archive: Melody of the Grave


The agents descend into the shadowed halls of Ravenwood, where cursed music weaves through crypt and stone. Whispers of a Maestro‚Äôs dark performance beckon them deeper, testing their resolve, their unity, and their very souls.


‚Äî By scale and secret, we endure.
Scalebound Syndicate High Command

***Editors note, this is the 3rd session of our campaign, however due to technical issues, episodes 1 and 2 are lost to other planes of existence...***

item.description: Bob O, Ivy, New player to the game Lady Rose, Captain M, and Der Damon talk about their gaming acolades and just a little bit of Nerd News.

item.description: Which is to say we barely talk about anything currently relevant. Bob O, Ivy, and Psuedo talk about random things that really don't matter.

item.description: Bob O. Ivy, Kitten and Kaleb play some Magic and kinda talk about nerd shit.

item.description: Bob O, Frost, and new contributor Ivy return to talk about nerd shit!

item.description: Bob O and Frost are alone so this is going to be a weird one folks. P3 Network is here to talk about gaming and other random excitement within the gaming and TV/Movie Universe.

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 81: Frost keeps breaking shit
item.description: Join us in the chaos that is Around the Nerd, Now shortened to keep attention spans.

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 80: Who gave Spencer the Keys to the Studio
item.description: Frost, Bob O., and stuck in our doorway Spencer Hart talk about randomness... No plan? fuck it.

item.description: We are here to talk about SOOOOO much. Please enjoy

item.description: Bob fell on ice again and refuses to move so we're blaming the sound quality and lack of an opening on that.

item.description: Okay we'll tell you, it's Frost and Bob O. back to talk about random things.

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 75: Frost and Bob are Alone Again 2: The reckoning
item.description: Bob O and Frost are back with Episode 74 to talk about all the random stuff they can but not all the random stuff they usually rant about.

item.description: Karisma and Walrus decided to not leave us alone... which is probably a good thing as we recap nerd news for you today

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 73: They really need to stop leaving us alone.
item.description: Frost and Bob O are alone again, well Bob O is Frost is on VR chat with his woman for some reason... COME ON FROST WE ARE RECORDING A PODCAST

item.description: Bob O and Frost set out alone once again, which means this is probably a Power Rangers/Kamen Rider Heavy Episode.

item.description: Bob O. Karisma, Cyborg Walrus, and Frost are here to be dumba$$es yet again.

item.description: So after Bob O failed Miserably, we are trying this again. This time we aren't muted for the first 20 minutes.

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 70: 3 Years later and we still don't know what we're doing
item.description: The 3 year Anniversary Episode of Around the Nerd. No fancy intros no weird extras just us nerds

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 69: Put your Weenis in my mouth
item.description: Weenis is an elbow folks... look it up. This is going to be a really weird one. Hang on tight. Frost, Karisma and Bob O. are back for more fun.

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 68: Tank of Buttholes
item.description: Don't ask why it's named how it is, cuz we don't know, but Walrus is here, as is Karisma and Bob O.

item.description: There is a storm coming, and we are racing it so Bob O doesn't get cut off once again.

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 30: Getting the Band back together... I mean Gang...
item.description: In a non racial stereotype way I mean gang... Moose, Karisma, Frost and Bob O. are here for another round of random bullshit... On today's docket, Spiderman, and the distinct lack of a Power Rangers sequel

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 29: Bigger Longer and Uncut Broly
item.description: Yes, we are talking about the Dragon Ball Super Broly Movie AGAIN. This time we, meaning Frost, (Thank you Frost) have money and can actually talk about the full movie instead of having to cut it short.

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 28 Around the Nerd After Dark
item.description: Around the Nerd after dark, Bob O and Frost are tired... and need to produce content... this should be interesting... Plus maybe Kharisma will eventually join us.

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 27: We're back Finally
item.description: Well after a horrid attampted glitch filled episode that failed, Bob O, Karisma and Frost are here to talk about everything

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 26: This is Why We Can't Have Nice Things
item.description: Thanks a lot Karisma!

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 25: 1/4 of the Way to 100!
item.description: I can't believe it we made it to 25 Episodes. This is going to be umce and Bob O's usual mish-mash of bullsh** ENJOY!

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 24: One more thing, the Bane of Around the Nerd
item.description: Well this was a fun one to record, and we ask for patience and leniency... We love you P3 Network fans. Enjoy this episode of Frost and Captain M talk about MCU ft: Bob O. and umce Sorta... maybe...

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 23: Where the hell is umce?
item.description: We lost umce, we don't know where he went so we have Frost and M to join Bob O. and talk about the most random bullshit they can think of.

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 22: Sometimes Couples fight...
item.description: And sometimes they stop talking to you right before you start recording a podcast... #Awkward. Bob and umce are back... for some reason...

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 21: Broly FINALLY!
item.description: We promised this back when umce was still paying his girlfriend to laugh at his jokes, well she's off the payroll now and here it is, the Broly Episode.

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 20.5 Slack Off Takeover (Kinda)
item.description: Bob O and Frost finally are able to connect and do a podcast together, but Karisma is nowhere to be found... so they spend 40 minutes not talking about Pokemon... and maybe 4 minutes actually on the correct topic!

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 20: Dusting off the Microphone
item.description: We're back after breaking Bob O's computer, and there is a slight chance we may have found other people!

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 19: We are not even close to ready for today!
item.description: Snow is everywhere and it's cold, Bob O and umce try to make the best of it and Bob O. does 99% of the talking like usual. Today's topics Sims 4, McDonalds/Burger King, Harry Potter, and Eminem.

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 18 Not Enough Booze in the World
item.description: As you'll be able to tell from the opening this is going to be a fun one folks... Discussing Aquaman and a single part of Broly we found... in the trash bin outside best buy... wait are we sure it's the right movie? Yeah?... okay...

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 17 Broly
item.description: We have finally met our diversity quota. Yes we are joined by umce's pretend girlfriend Tee. (this is payback for last week) We have predictions for the movie we are seeing tonight!

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 16: Bob is a douche, the podcast (the musical) the movie
item.description: In case you can't tell... umce named this episode. We have no idea what we're going to talk about... but I can promise you it's not Religion or politics.

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 15: Reborn and Ready!
item.description: First episode under the new name and at the start of a New Year! 2019 will be a year of growth... and not just umce's growing depression.

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 14: Holy Shit... I thought i would have given up by now
item.description: Bob O. and umce talk about random shit yet again! Nintendo Switch, Diablo III Eternal collection and Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 13: Memes, Depression, and more Farting than will ever be needed
item.description: Bob O and umce have no idea how to describe this episode. So... just listen to it... please... we're not begging you're begging... MOOOOOOOOOM!!!!

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 12: Gogeta, Cowboys, and Iron Man Dying in space
item.description: Bob O and Umce talk about the newest Broly trailer, (again) Red Dead Redemption 2, and the Avenger's Endgame trailer that dropped this morning.

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 11: Fat guys and fatter guy (Edit)
item.description: Bob O @FalconJ , Umce @not_umce , and M are here to talk about random things, included the death of the creator of Spongebob, (for about 35 seconds) Also a lot more Star Wars talk than we originally planned. Also a lot of making fun of each other... As always follow us on Twitter and Facebook for more behind the scenes content! @podcastP3

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 10: We... ran out of movies to reference
item.description: Bob O. and umce are here again for the far less depressing 10th episode! Dick jokes and jokes at Bob's expense (Literally since he pays for the Spreaker) ahoy!

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 9: Thank you Stan Lee
item.description: This episode is exactly what it sounds like. A small tribute to Stan "The Man" Lee the Hero of Heroes. Also to distract from the broken hearts we will briefly give a review of the Crimes of Grindelwald.

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 8; The Last Dick Joke
item.description: Let's be honest... Umce will never stop making dick jokes... but this episode we talk bout dicks only once! Bob O and Umce do however talk about the new Overwatch character briefly, Books, Fallout 76, and Bob's feelings (just kidding Bob doesn't have feelings.)

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 7: Karisma Awakens
item.description: Karisma finally joins Bob O. and umce in this Episode and they talk about just about everything. Including Karisma's lack of defending her title and Bob O's lack of defending against anyone but Nate the FN Great and his son.

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 6: Return of the Idiots
item.description: Bob O and Umce are back after a week hiatus... for absolutely no reason... except maybe laziness and the lack of a matching schedule. On this weeks podcast; The 13th Doctor's first... and maybe second episode review. And whatever the hell umce decides to talk about.

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 05: P3 Network Strikes back?
item.description: Bob O and umce kinda have a plan today, but it doesn't involve Star Wars... probably...

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 4: The Friday Night Party Redux Edition: On Thursday!
item.description: Bob O. Umce, our new contributor Smalls as well as the Saltiest Nate the FN great. Talk about stuff... Legit we have no plan again!

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 3 Part 2: Friday Night Party Redux (Listener Requested)
item.description: Part 2 of the 9/21 episode of the Friday Night Party Redux. Because apparently we can't say no to our one live listener that actively comments.

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 3: Friday Night Party Redux Edition
item.description: Umce and Bob O. have given up on Perth (Don't worry we still Love you Perth!) and are back to talk about stuff. I don't think we even have an actual plan... but you know what... we're gonna wing it!

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 2.5: The Friday Night Party Redux Edition: umce broke the live stream...
item.description: Part 2 of the 9/13 Episode of the Friday Night Party Redux. Umce has put away his 'ego' so we are able to continue.

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 2: The Friday Night Party Redux Edition: Where is Perth? Part II; The Perthening
item.description: Perth has disappeared again. The independent Pokemon Champion Bob O. and umce discus that interesting development as well as the total asshattery that is Verizon of California and more on this weeks episode.

item.title: [Around the Nerd] Episode 1: Wait a Second Where is Perth?
item.description: umce and the Independent Pokemon Champion Bob O. Discuss various fun things including a review of Avengers Infinity War (Finally). The lowering difficulty levels in recent Pokemon Games. And where Perth may have vanished to.
